subject: English
goals: Understand the basics of creative writing and develop an initial idea for a short story.
milestones: Complete a brainstorming session to generate story ideas and select one idea to develop further.

learning_tasks.task: Read an introduction to creative writing, focusing on narrative structure and genre.
Brainstorm a list of potential story ideas.

practice_tasks.task: Select one idea and create a basic outline for a short story including characters, setting, and plot.

resources: Suggested reading: 'The Elements of Story: Field Notes on Nonfiction Writing' by Francis Flaherty; online writing resources such as the Purdue OWL Creative Writing section.
